SELECT AM.*, M.nickname AS extra__writer, M.age AS extra__age, M.gender AS extra__gender, M.name AS extra__writerRealName, M.cellphoneNo AS extra__writerCellphoneNo, M.email AS extra__writerEmail, M.nickname AS extra__writer FROM applyment AS AM INNER JOIN member AS M ON AM.memberId = M.id WHERE AM.relId = #{relId} AND AM.relTypeCode = #{relTypeCode} AND AM.displayStatus = 1 AND AM.delStatus = 0 AND AM.id >= #{from} AND AM.memberId = #{memberId} ORDER BY AM.id ASC

SELECT AM.*, M.nickname AS extra__writer, M.age AS extra__age, M.gender AS extra__gender, M.name AS extra__writerRealName, M.cellphoneNo AS extra__writerCellphoneNo, M.email AS extra__writerEmail, M.nickname AS extra__writer FROM applyment AS AM INNER JOIN member AS M ON AM.memberId = M.id WHERE AM.displayStatus = 1 AND AM.id = #{id} AND AM.result = #{result} AND AM.delStatus = 0 ORDER BY AM.id ASC

SELECT AM.*, M.nickname AS extra__writer, M.age AS extra__age, M.gender AS extra__gender, M.name AS extra__writerRealName, M.cellphoneNo AS extra__writerCellphoneNo, M.email AS extra__writerEmail, M.nickname AS extra__writer FROM applyment AS AM INNER JOIN member AS M ON AM.memberId = M.id WHERE AM.displayStatus = 1 AND AM.delStatus = 0 AND AM.id = #{id}

SELECT AP.*, AC.id AS actingRole__id FROM applyment AS AP LEFT JOIN actingRole AS AC ON AP.relId = AC.id WHERE AP.memberId = #{memberId} AND AP.relTypeCode = "actingRole"
